name: oanhnn/slim-skeleton
description: A Slim Framework skeleton application for rapid development

suggest.monolog/monolog: Required to use log service provider (~1.13)
suggest.slim/php-view: Required to use PHP view service provider (^2.0).
suggest.slim/twig-view: Required to use Twig view service provider (^2.0).
suggest.slim/http-cache: Required to use http cache service provider (^0.3.0).
suggest.slim/csrf: Required to protect CSRF attack by csrf middleware (^0.4.0).
